thread.title: Ann Summers urgently recalls vibrator over fears of electric shock
thread.title_full: Ann Summers urgently recalls vibrator over fears of electric shock

title: Ann Summers urgently recalls vibrator over fears of electric shock
text:
PA/SWNS RECALL: The Black Power Wand is being recalled by Ann Summers 
The sex shop has reported cases of the Black Power Wand vibrator becoming damaged from overuse. 
The store has advised customers who own the 9.5 inch Black Power Wand to visit their nearest store or contact customer services. 
The recall is a precautionary measure – but vibrators have become damaged in a small number of cases. 
SWNS DAMAGED: According to the recall notice there have been cases of expose wires “We have taken this voluntary measure in response to a very small number cases” Ann Summers recall notice 
The store is displaying notices in shop windows and the vibrator is no longer available to buy online at Ann Summers. 
The notice reads: "The quality and safety of our products are of paramount importance to us. 
SWNS SAFETY: The company said the recall was precautionary Real Sex Dolls in pictures Tuesday, 18th October 2016 A sex doll (also love doll or blow up doll) is a type of sex toy in the size and shape of a sexual partner for aid in masturbation. We take a look at the most life like dolls available in the world. 1 / 27 A visitor of the erotic fair "Venus" touches an erotic rubber doll in Berlin 
"Therefore, as a precautionary measure we are recalling the above product. 
"The product complies with all relevant CE safety testing standards, but we have taken this voluntary measure in response to a very small number of isolated reports that the wires in the cord have become exposed at the base of the product over a prolonged period of use." Related articles
